name: Frame Gride
description:
Frame Gride is a Japanese mecha fighting game made for the Sega Dreamcast by FromSoftware.

Similar to From's Armored Core series, the mecha in the game are heavily customizable.

The game had a single-player mode, a local two-player mode, and an online two-player mode when it was released on 15 July 1999, but the online network was discontinued on 31 January 2001.
